text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: When speaking of Niigata, of course one must mention the 1000m straight!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's the only such course in Japan, and the pride of this Niigata racetrack!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The straight view of the goal is so refreshing!! Why, it's just like me! How wonderful!! My feet are itching to start running!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I can't not bakushin here!! Bakushiiiin!!!
